content: materials approx 400 yds 4 oz of sport weight yarn and a size h crochet hook or approx 400 yds 7 oz of worsted weight yarn and a size k crochet hook exact yardage needed will depend on desired finished size of shawl one removable stitch marker gauge about 4 5 double_crochet per inch with sport weight yarn and a size h hook gauge is not critical use an appropriate sized hook to achieve a nice fabric with nice drape shawl will expand slightly with blocking abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet trebble crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain skip - skip difficulty mederate/beginner includes written directions and a hand-drawn chart
